bibl.title: Acta Alexandrinorum. En allemand, avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Edition of a tiny fragment that sheds new light on the charges leveled against C. Vibius Maximus, Prefect of Egypt in AD 103-107, who was accused of maladministration, and of having an improper affair with a young boy. It is tempting to recognize a reference to the latter in the fragment. Fayoum (?), 2nd / 3rd cent. AD.

bibl.title: Festschrift für Günter Poethke zum 70. Geburtstag (P. Poethke)

bibl.seg: SARISCHOULI Panagiota, Acta Alexandrinorum. En allemand, avec résumé en anglais.
Festschrift für Günter Poethke zum 70. Geburtstag (P. Poethke) = ArchPF 55 (2009) pp. 454-461, No. 35 et pl. XXIX.

Edition of a tiny fragment that sheds new light on the charges leveled against C. Vibius Maximus, Prefect of Egypt in AD 103-107, who was accused of maladministration, and of having an improper affair with a young boy. It is tempting to recognize a reference to the latter in the fragment. Fayoum (?), 2nd / 3rd cent. AD.
